speaker: Narration
text: [i]Welcome to the 'Devil Busters – Extreme Pain' server! I'm the main developer of this server, Unknown Familiar, and I hope you have a great time here. Please adhere to the rules. [/i]

speaker: Narration
text: [i]The bot lists the server rules. [/i]

speaker: Kami
text: Standard rules. Non-harassment. No racism. All that stuff. Skip!

speaker: Narration
text: [i]Thank you for reading the rules. To start a character on this server, please select it as your primary server in the menu. Playing on this server will not put you at risk of being banned when interacting with the official servers, and nothing will be displayed when admins check your servers list. Please use an exciting character that you have already created on an official server.

speaker: fujiwara
text: Oh, that's something new. So we don't even need to create a new identity?

speaker: kami
text: Wow! How do they even mask this server in the server menu? That's something new. The homebrew scene is coming along pretty well.

choices.text: It looks like you won't be able to create a new funny nickname, Kami.
At least i won’t have to look at the confusing guide again.

speaker: kami
text: Definitely!

speaker: fujiwara
text: Now that's the kind of people I can respect. Limits or not, they will achieve what they want.

speaker: kami
text: Oh my God, you're right! This is both convenient and horrible; I'm torn.

speaker: fujiwara
text: Just use one of the characters you have with a funny name. You have much more than one...

speaker: kami
text: I don’t have that problem.

speaker: fujiwara
text: Oh, i know, halleluiah to that.

speaker: fujiwara
text: Anyway. I'm going to use my rather undeveloped character, Parkour Battle Dude.

speaker: kami
text: Oh, I'm going to use the Deep Diva of the Beyond. The name oozes mystery and power.

speaker: Narration
text: [i]Which of your characters are you going to use? You're going to stick with the nickname for a while...

speaker: kami
text: Digital Messiah is still a very try hard name, maybe pick something more casual?

speaker: fujiwara
text: It certainly sounds like a video game nickname. I'll give you that.

speaker: kami
text: Yes, I remember that one.

speaker: fujiwara
text: Sick name, bro! You gonna intimated demons with that one for sure.

speaker: kami
text: if only the world had more United Warriors, it could be a more stable and fairer place.

speaker: fujiwara
text: These Fists are rated E for everyone, am i right?

speaker: kami
text: Oh, is that what you name means?

speaker: Narration
text: [i]In order to create a character here, we will have to wipe all save data assigned to your character. Do you wish to proceed?

speaker: kami
text: Wow, er, I suppose I should have expected that. It's OK; this character only took me 15 hours to max out.

speaker: fujiwara
text: Only 15 hours? You're crazy good at this game! My character isn't important; I'm fine with wiping it.

speaker: Narration
text: [i]You all agreed to the stipulations needed to access this server.

speaker: Narration
text: [i]Now, I have one question for you. Are you ready to experience a ‘True Digital Real Story?’ May your journey from now on be full of decisions that prove whether you truly regret your current life and want to change things, or whether you simply come to the conclusion that the cycle of life is perfect. Wander between two worlds of endless perspectives and forge your own path. Just…Survive.

speaker: kami
text: It's very ominous. Do you think that in this story, we get to have many choices that will affect the game?

speaker: kami
text: Well, let's see...

speaker: fujiwara
text: It sounds like it. Let's get to the gameplay already!

speaker: fujiwara
text: Haha, yup, I in for the gameplay! Just let me kill some demons.

speaker: fujiwara
text: Every server has multiple worlds.

speaker: kami
text: Maybe this one has two expansive worlds, unlike other servers that just have tens of small ones.
